traits.name: Rapt Attention
traits.effect: Handle tasks with heightened effeciency, reducing completion time

skills.name: Divine Conqueror
skills.description: Deals Electro Damage to enemies within range in front and creates a field of [Legion's Punishment] at the locations. [Legion's Punishment]: When created and after a 1.5s delay, [Legion's Punishment] consumes a certain amount of [Might of Thunder] every 0.4s to deal Electro Dmage to 1 random enemy within range, lasting up to 10s. When [Might of Thunder] depleted, the [Legion's Punishment] dissipates. A maximum of 3 fields can exist at the same time.

skills.name: Stormcaller
skills.description: Summons [Chaotic Thunderorb]. A maximum of 1 can exist at the same time. Consumes [Might of Thunder] to summon an enhanced [Chaotic Thunderorb]. The interval for the enhanced [Chaotic Thunderorb] to trigger [Devastating Storm] is reduced to 2s, and its Link Damage is increased. [Chaotic Thunderorb]: Inherits a certain eprcentage of Sibylle's Max HP with 0 DEF, and is considered an enemy unit. Once summoned, [Chaotic Thunderorb] calls forth [Devastating Storm] once every 3s and links to the furthest enemies within range. It links 1 more enemy per second, up to 10 enemies, dealing Electro Dmage to the linked targets once per second. When [Chaotic Thunderorb] takes damage, it transfer the damage taken to the linked targets at a certain percentage. [Devastating Storm]: Deals Electro Damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Might of Thunder
skills.description: When the damage dealt triggers Bonus Effect, Sibylle gains certain points of [Might of Thunder], up to 300 points. [Divine Conqueror] and [Stormcaller] can be empowered by consuming [Might of Thunder] points.
